questions.question:
What method is commonly used to find approximate 
 solutions to equations by repeatedly adjusting 
 the initial guess until the solution is 
 accurate enough?

Which algorithm is used to find the eigenvalues and eigenvectors 
 of a square matrix?

What is the primary goal of the Gauss-Seidel method in 
 numerical linear algebra?

Which sorting algorithm has an average and 
 worst-case time complexity of 
 O(n log n)?

What data structure is typically used to implement 
 a priority queue?

Which algorithm is used to find the shortest 
 path in a weighted graph from a single 
 source vertex to all other vertices?

What is the primary purpose of dynamic programming 
 in algorithm design?
options: To find the maximum or minimum of a sequence of numbers
To sort elements in an array
To solve optimization problems by breaking them down into simpler subproblems
questions.correct_answer: To solve optimization problems by breaking them down into simpler subproblems

questions.question:
Which algorithm is used to find the maximum 
 flow in a flow network from a source to a sink?

What is the primary purpose of the Fast Fourier 
 Transform (FFT) algorithm?
options: To solve systems of linear equations
To find the eigenvalues of a matrix
To compute the discrete Fourier transform efficiently
questions.correct_answer: To compute the discrete Fourier transform efficiently

questions.question:
Which algorithm is used to efficiently find the 
 closest pair of points in a set of points?

What is the primary purpose of the simplex 
 algorithm in linear programming?
options: To solve systems of linear equations
To compute the convex hull of a set of points
To find the shortest path in a graph
To solve optimization problems by iteratively improving a feasible solution
questions.correct_answer: To solve optimization problems by iteratively improving a feasible solution

questions.question:
Which algorithm is used to compute the convex 
 hull of a set of points in the plane?

What is the primary purpose of the 
 Rabin-Karp algorithm?
options: To solve systems of linear equations
To find the shortest path in a graph
To compute the discrete Fourier transform

questions.question:
Which algorithm is used to find all the strongly 
 connected components in a directed graph?

What is the primary purpose of the 
 A* search algorithm?
options: To find the shortest path in a weighted graph
To solve systems of linear equations
To compute the convex hull of a set of points
questions.correct_answer: To find the shortest path in a weighted graph
